channel.title: gif on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in gif on Barefoot Rob

item.title: i scribble
item.description: my Scribble Thursday 15 October 1998 I’ve been goofing around with JavaScript and some .gif animations. My sense is that although my page hasn’t had much animation and stuff on it, if I wanna make pages for others, I need to know how to do it. So, while goofing around, I made this scribble.
